attributes.action: Stop waisting time with the BBC Brand/Ross Prank Call
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I want this countries government to stop waisting time discussing good taste in TV/Radio and concentrate on running our country. I ask that the government stops reacting to overblown, media fuelled drivel stories and concentrate on building our economy back up, national security, health, policing and education.

reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
